Curriculum Vitae
                                                                                                                                     
Dineshkumar Emayarajan
Email id: dineshkumaremayarajan@gmail.com , Mobile:  (+91) 99529 28543 / +966 99621 60089
OBJECTIVE    
To work efficiently in any esteemed organization and grows with it by achieving
organizational goals. 
SUMMARY 
Bachelors  of  Mechanical  Engineering,  2009  with  5.2  years  Experience  in
Construction of  Residential & Commercial  buildings  Industry &  Q A / Q C  In
production field .
MEP Engineer Coordinator with Electrical , Civil & Arch Tech Engineer s
Desired Position – QA/QC Mechanical Engineer ( MEP ) & MEP Co-Ordinator
Expert in plumbing & Fire Fighting and basic knowledge in HVAC , installation works. 
Worked in MARAFIQ (Saudi Arabia) standards.
Worked in Infrastructure Irrigation & Planting Grass , Trees
Controlling sub- contractors , material checking as per procurement list
Plumbing & Fire Fighting execution , installation of all sanitary fixtures, water supply
pipes , drainage pipes, Sprinkler , FM200 system  & installation of all pipes
Installation of potable water pipes , Fire Fighting pipes & pressure gauge with hydro
testing 
Good knowledge in preparation of Material Cost comparison chart, RFI, Hold Points.
Proficient in AutoCAD, Pro E & Ms office (Excel, Word, Power point) 
Ability to control quality of work.
Material inspection as per approved material from royal commission  & Dammam
University
Ability to Controlling & handling supervisors and leadman , plumbers 
Ability to provide technical assistance and resolution. 
Ability to work together with other engineers and individuals to solve and define the
developmental problems. 
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Roles and Responsibilities (Quality Control Engineer):
